name: Reindeer Run (bauerlive)
description:
This year, it's all haywire at Santa. He really needs your help, little reindeer !

So go out there, pick Santa's tasks and give him a hand by collecting what he needs, save your friends that got lost in the caves and finally become the hero of this year's Christmas !

You control the little reindeer by tapping left or right on your mobile or swiping up if you want to jump. Find the hidden treasures deep in the caves and collect the neat little coins to buy some power-ups that can help you further in this awesome platform game.

Each level is different - so be sure to check what you need to do before jumping into the action.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
